import React, { Component } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' export default class Authentification extends Component { constructor(props) { super(props); this.state = { email: '', passWord: "", redirect: "" } this.change = this.change.bind(this) } setAuthToken(token) { if (token) { console.log("if token"); var t = "bearer " + token console.log(t); axios.defaults.headers.common['authorization'] = t } else { console.log("else token"); delete axios.defaults.headers.common['authorization']; } } render() { return (
